items.sentence: You knew Tom wasn\'t supposed to do that, didn\'t you?
Tom swore he wasn\'t going to say anything to anybody.
Tom doesn\'t know anything about computer programming.
There have been a lot of complaints about that policy.
There is a very strict rule forbidding smoking in bed.
There is close relationship between supply and demand.
There is no reason for you to feel inferior to anyone.
There is no use crying for help. No one will hear you.
That\'s the way we\'ve always done things around here.
I don\'t study as much as my parents tell me I should.
I don\'t think I could spend six hours alone with you.
I don\'t want to think about what could have happened.
I don\'t want Tom to think he has to interpret for me.
Tom still hasn\'t quite learned the rules of the game.
Tom doesn\'t know how to treat his employees properly.
Tom doesn\'t like the same kind of music as Mary does.
Tom doesn\'t like to ride the subway during rush hour.
Tom doesn\'t practice the piano as much as he used to.
Tom doesn\'t seem to be as active as Mary seems to be.
Tom didn\'t seem surprised to see Mary at the concert.
Tom doesn\'t have anyone to discuss his problems with.
Tom doesn\'t have to go back to Boston until tomorrow.
Could you tell me how to get to Park Street from here?
For some strange reason, Tom is wearing a dress today.
Have you already told Tom about what happened to Mary?
I beg your pardon, but would you repeat what you said?
I\'m not sure what time the concert is going to start.
I\'m pretty sure that Tom is hiding the truth from us.
I\'m really bad with names, but I never forget a face.
I was wondering if this might just be a waste of time.
I watched baseball on TV after I finished my homework.
I went back to bed after I talked to Tom on the phone.
I went to bed after locking all the doors and windows.
I went to the refrigerator to get myself another beer.
Tom didn\'t want to follow in his father\'s footsteps.
No matter how you do it, the results will be the same.
On large farms, cattle are usually marked with brands.
Our preacher preaches the same sermon every Christmas.
Please bring us two cups of tea and one cup of coffee.
Seen from the sky, the river looked like a huge snake.
I don\'t see why everyone thinks this book is so good.
Tom\'s thinking of moving so he\'ll be closer to Mary.
Tom\'s younger brother is dating Mary\'s older sister.
You do not have to go to the dance unless you want to.
Aren\'t you hot? Why don\'t you take off your sweater?
My opinion about that topic has changed several times.
My wife and I are planning to visit Boston next month.
My youngest brother was brought up by our grandmother.
Tom and Mary couldn\'t agree on how it should be done.
I suspect Tom and Mary weren\'t the ones who did that.
